alert.note: Alert for Jones (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 21 at 10:29AM CDT until March 25 at 7:52PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tallahala Creek At Laurel affecting Jones County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON TO FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tallahala Creek At Laurel. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon to Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Water begins to cover Old Sandersville Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Monday the stage was 7.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Wednesday afternoon to a crest of 15.5 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Tallahala Creek Laurel 13.0 7.4 Mon 9 am CDT 8.0 12.8 15.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 9 PM CDT.
